description: Do you enjoy watching scenes that are as real as life? Do you enjoy knowing that the model is suffering as much as possible at the hands of the meanest mother fucker on the internet? Of course you do, and that is why you begged for this style of shoot to be done again; so we did it. Roxanne and The Pope are as real as you are gonna get when it comes to brutality and torment. The domination that he dishes out, especially to her, is extreme, yet she keeps coming back wanting more. Roxanne is locked into steel shackles on the floor in a spread eagle position. She is as helpless as it gets and waits for the entrance of her Master. The lights are all off except for just enough to see her. The point of this is to allow The Pope to move around her without her knowing where he is. She hears his boots on the floor, but cannot see him as he moves in and out of the shadows. She is subjected to his sadistic torment all day, which include flogging, a zipper, hot wax, and breath play just to name a few. When he has finished with her she remains shackled to the floor to reflect on the tyerror that was just unleashed on her as she sobs.
title: The Depths of Hell - Day 3
